name: AIO Cache & Performance
author: The AIO Cache Team

sections.description:
AIO Cache, a stable and simple cache, minify, and performance solution for those of you looking for solid raw performance and response times. Fast, Powerful, and Effective!

Unlike other performance solutions, you don’t need to configure AIO Cache. Just install and go. Quick and Simple!

Best part is that it is designed to avoid breaking your site. Stable and Solid!

AIO Cache Offers:

  • Simple Page & File Caching
  • Simple Static Resources
  • Simple GZip & Deflate Compression
  • JavaScripts to Footer
sections.faq:
All questions -NOT related to- AIO Cache “PRO” can be asked on the WordPress.org standard forum.

Any users who have donated to AIO Cache “PRO” in the past are asked to go to www.adamsassets.com/portfolio/twin-tech/products/web-development/caching for any questions regarding the “PRO” version of this plugin.
